str2: When, at which time. From hos and te; at which too, i.e. When.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To come, go.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Apparently a primary word; a spot, i.e. Location; figuratively, condition, opportunity; specially, a scabbard.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I call, summon, invite, (b) I call, name. Akin to the base of keleuo; to 'call'.
A skull. Diminutive of a derivative of the base of keras; a skull.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From stauros; to impale on the cross; figuratively, to extinguish passion or selfishness.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
(a) there, yonder, in that place, (b) thither, there. Of uncertain affinity; there; by extension, thither.
And, even, also, namely.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
(lit: an evil-worker), a criminal. From kakos and the base of ergon; a wrong-doer, i.e. Criminal.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
On the right hand, right hand, right. From dechomai; the right side or hand.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
On the left hand. Apparently a comparative of the same as ariston; the left hand.
